SpreSkill
Your German Fluency App

Just relying on learning grammar and vocabularies won't make you speak fluently and clearly. Level up now your fluency level using advanced speech recognition technology

Google Play

Gamified Experience

Staying motivated and patient is a key to reach your goals. We challenge you then reward you. We show you your progress to make you believe in your hidden capability.

Personalized Experience

You will start with simple phrases, then every user is graded differently based on your fluency level "pronunciation score & Rate of speech" after third step.

Socialized Experience

Sharing ideas and experience with fellow learners make practicing more enjoyable.
